Translations.Text: hananim-eun maliaui adeul ye sulo hayeogeum geu ijeon-e gyesidoen gu yag-eul hwagjunghamyeonseo geudeul-ui baljachwi leul ttaleudolog haessnola ttohan hananim eun sin-yag-eul gyesihayeo geu ijeon-e gye sidoen guyag-eul hwagjeunghamyeonseo geu an-e bog-eumgwa gwangmyeong-ol jueoss-euni ineun bog eum-iyo jeong-uie saneun jadeul-ui gyohun ila
geuligo sin-yag-ui baegseongdeullo ha yeogeum hananim-i gyesihan daelo pangyeol ke hala haess-euni hananim-i gyesihan daelo pangyeolchi anihan ja geudeul-eun joeindeul-ila

hananim-eun geudaeege geu ijeon e gyesidoen geos-eul hwagjunghago jung-eonha myeo seongseoleul gyesihanani hananim-i gyesihan geos-eulo geudeul-eun jaepanhadoe jeong-uieseo beos-eonan geudeul-ui yogue ttaleuji malla hananim-eun neohui gagja ege yulbeob-eul jueossnani hananim-ui tteus-ilamyeon neohuiege gongdongcheleul hyeongseongke halyeo ham-ila geuleona geubun-eun geugeos-eulo neohuileul siheomhalyeo ham-ini seonhaeng-e gyeongjuhala neohuiui modeun geos eun hananimkkelo gwiuihamyeo neohuiga dallihago issneun geos-e daehayeo balghyeo jusilila

geudaeege gyesihan yulbeob-eulo geudeul-eul jaepanhadoe geudeul-eul hananim i gyesihan ba-e ttala jaepanhaessdamyeon geudeul-ui yoguleul ttaleuji malmyeo hana nim-i geudaeege gyesihan geos-eulobuteogeudeul-ui italham-eul gyeong-gyehala man-il geudeul-i baebanhandamyeon hananim-eun geudeul-ege geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-ege beol-i naelim-eul geudaeneun al la sillo anh-eun muliga bulboghadeola
geudeul-i wonhago issneun geos-eun mu ji sidaeui simpan-i anigessneunyo geu leona mid-eum-eul gajin sin-ang-indeul-egeneun hananimboda hullyunghan jaepangwan-i eodi issneunyo
